numericalresponse.p: What is the company's expected profit from car rental at that location? Hint: The expected profit \(P(Q)\) when we order \(Q\) items is given by:
numericalresponse.label:
\(P(Q)=E[(r-c)min[Q,d]-(c-s)max[0,Q-d]]\)in which \(r\) is the revenue per day, \(c\) is the cost per day, and \(s\) is the salvage value per dayï¼Œ\(d\) is the demand.
\(P(Q)\) can also be Revenue-Cost: \(P(Q)=E[Revenue]-Cost\)
